description: Balsam fir (Abies balsamea 'Nana') is an amazing tree species with a pleasing conical shape, soft needles, and a beautiful, silvery blue-green color. Its great for landscaping because it is tolerant of a wide range of growing conditions and can even survive in dry and sandy soil. It is also widely used as a Christmas tree and is prized because of its aroma. The balsam fir also has great longevity, as it can live for up to 70 years. This species is a wonderful addition to any yard, as it adds beauty, strong branches, and shade.
